name: SB Banner Widget
author: SB Team

sections.description:
SB Banner Widget is a plugin that allows to add banner widget on your WordPress site. Drag SB Banner into widget area where you want banner will be shown.

Required Plugin

  • SB Core

Translations

  • English
  • Vietnamese

Recommended WordPress Plugins

  • SB Clean
  • SB Comment
  • SB Paginate
  • SB Login Page
  • SB Post Widget
  • SB Tab Widget
  • SB TBFA
sections.installation:
Install this plugin from your WordPress site Dashboard or follow these steps below:

  1. Download plugin from WordPress Plugins directory and extract it.
  2. Upload the sb-banner-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the SB Banner Widget plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: Please visit homepage for more details.
